amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds in the bill from being used to issue, administer, or enforce any order by the District of Columbia Commission on Human Rights related to docket numbers 93-030-(PA) and 93-031-(PA) concerning the Boy Scouts of America.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section at the end of the bill providing that none of the funds in the bill may be used to issue, administer, or enforce any order by the District of Columbia's Commission on Human Rights relating to docket #'s 93-030-(PA) and 93-031-(PA).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hostettler amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 262 - 152 (Roll no. 354).
